```{r}
library(tidyverse)
data19<-read_csv("C:/Users/82102/OneDrive/바탕 화면/대외활동모음/2021 문화관광 빅데이터 분석대회/occur_rank_19.csv", col_names=c("n","word","num"), skip=1)

data20<-read_csv("C:/Users/82102/OneDrive/바탕 화면/대외활동모음/2021 문화관광 빅데이터 분석대회/occur_rank_20.csv", col_names=c("n","word","num"), skip=1)
```

```{r}
word_over20<-filter(data19, num>=20)
word_over20_2<-filter(data20, num>=20)
```


```{r}
#단어만 나열
word_ints<-intersect(word_over20$word, word_over20_2$word)
word_ints

#합한 tibble n이 19기준
word_ints_tib19<-word_over20%>%inner_join(word_over20_2, by="word")
word_ints_tib19

word_ints_tib20<-word_over20_2%>%inner_join(word_over20, by="word")
word_ints_tib20

#20년도 증가한 keyword
word_increase<-filter(word_ints_tib20, n.x<n.y)
head(word_increase, n=20)

#20년도 감소한 keyword
word_decrease<-filter(word_ints_tib20, n.x>n.y)
head(word_decrease, n=20)
```
